description: Join the cosmic adventurers, Star-Lord, Gamora, Rocket Raccoon, Drax and Groot as you play through the epic opening sequence from Marvel Studios' Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2! In this film-inspired level pack, players will need to defend against and face an inter-dimensional monster, the Abilisk, by using each character's unique abilities.
